thread.title: Paul Pogba is trying too hard to live up to £89million price tag at Manchester United he needs to do the simple things well again
thread.title_full: Paul Pogba is trying too hard to live up to £89million price tag at Manchester United he needs to do the simple things well again

author: wally Downes
title: Paul Pogba is trying too hard to live up to £89million price tag at Manchester United he needs to do the simple things well again
text:
EFL NEIL CUSTIS Paul Pogba is trying too hard to live up to £89million price tag at Manchester United he needs to do the simple things well again 
Pogba misplaced 21 passes, made just three tackles before Man United were dumped out of the FA Cup Comment
